Package src.semantics

Class Binding

java.lang.Object
src.semantics.Binding
Direct Known Subclasses:
Function, Klass, Variable
public abstract class Binding extends Object
An abstract class representing a binding in the semantic analysis phase. Bindings are used to associate identifiers with their corresponding types in a symbol table.

  • Constructor Details

    • Binding

      public Binding(Type t)
      Constructor to create a new Binding with a given type. It assigns a unique count to the binding using the Counter instance.
      Parameters:
      t - The Type associated with the binding.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public Type getType()
      Get the Type associated with this binding.
      Returns:
      The Type associated with the binding.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Get the unique count assigned to this binding. This count is generated by the Counter instance during the binding's creation.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The unique count associated with the binding.
